actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To require the Attorney General of the United States and the Federal Trade Commission to issue guidelines relating to mergers by wholesale purchasers of livestock, poultry, and unprocessed agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General and the Federal Trade Commission to issue guidelines relating to mergers by wholesale purchasers of livestock, poultry, and unprocessed agricultural commodities, taking into consideration such mergers' effects on farmers, ranchers, and agricultural producers.

titles.title: To require the Attorney General of the United States and the Federal Trade Commission to issue guidelines relating to mergers by wholesale purchasers of livestock, poultry, and unprocessed agricultural commodities.
